item.title: Former Goldman, JPMorgan exec gambled away investor funds for his online casino company: Feds
item.description: Investors who lost money in Richard Kim's alleged scheme included Galaxy Digital, where he had been a venture fund investor for six years.

item.title: Trump's Washington, DC, crime crackdown exposes gap between perception and reality
item.description: Despite President Donald Trump's claims about Washington, D.C., the city's crime rates have fallen. But many residents have fears about public safety.

item.title: Blocked roads and high security: What it means when JD Vance comes to town
item.description: Locals have criticized U.S. Vice President JD Vance's visit to the U.K., partly because they have been facing road closures and heightened security.

item.title: Putin vs. Trump? Ukraine talks could be a test of statecraft
item.description: Russia's president is going in to the high-stakes summit with little to lose and a lot to gain.

item.title: New York man charged with cyberstalking widow of slain UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson
item.description: The killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson on a Manhattan sidewalk, allegedly by Luigi Mangione, led some people to express anger at health in...
